name: Projet Crayon
description:
In Projet Crayon, you have to survive as much as you can! Create your own path between a bullet hell!

/!\ XBOX 360 GAMEPAD ONLY /!\

Left stick : Move
Right Stick : Rotate
RB or LB : Parry red bullet to win 2 secondes of peace!
A button: launch the game

Projet Crayon was a Twin Stick Shooter at first, but we found it more fun without shooting mechanics. Sadly, it was too late so we were unable to push it to the level of quality we expected!

Team : 

Code : Julien LIAUZUN , Rodolphe VIAL-PAILLER
Graphism : Clément "Bronislaw" NOWACKI
FX : Arnaud GUEGHEROUNI
Sound design but his PC died during the jam : Jean DESBEAUX
